content:
Is it be possible for intrinsics::assume to be a const function to make it usable in const functions?
It would be work-around for some issues like this one
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/82224
The most appropriate fix almost always (99.manynine% of cases) will not involve the assume intrinsic.
In this particular case giving more !range metadata to LLVM is probably more appropriate.
